speaker: Presented by F. Michael Watson
title: Statistical Report 1986
description: For the information of the members of the Church, the First Presidency has issued the following statistical report concerning the growth and status of the Church as of December 31, 1986. (Membership figures include estimates based on 1986 reports available prior to conference.)
